info.title: Schema of AzureCommunicationServices events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the AzureCommunicationServices events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

AcsChatEventBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all chat events

recipientCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the target user

transactionId.description: The transaction id will be used as co-relation vector

AcsChatEventInThreadBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all thread-level chat events

transactionId.description: The transaction id will be used as co-relation vector

AcsChatMessageDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageDeleted event.

deleteTime.description: The time at which the message was deleted

AcsChatMessageDeletedInThreadEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageDeletedInThread event.

deleteTime.description: The time at which the message was deleted

AcsChatMessageEditedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageEdited event.

messageBody.description: The body of the chat message

editTime.description: The time at which the message was edited

AcsChatMessageEditedInThreadEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageEditedInThread event.

messageBody.description: The body of the chat message

editTime.description: The time at which the message was edited

AcsChatMessageEventBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all chat message events

senderCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the sender

senderDisplayName.description: The display name of the sender

composeTime.description: The original compose time of the message

AcsChatMessageEventInThreadBasePropertie.description: Schema of common properties of all thread-level chat message events

senderCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the sender

senderDisplayName.description: The display name of the sender

composeTime.description: The original compose time of the message

AcsChatMessageReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageReceived event.

messageBody.description: The body of the chat message

AcsChatMessageReceivedInThreadEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageReceivedInThread event.

messageBody.description: The body of the chat message

AcsChatParticipantAddedToThreadEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadParticipantAdded event.

time.description: The time at which the user was added to the thread

addedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who added the user

participantAdded.description: The details of the user who was added

AcsChatParticipantAddedToThreadWithUserE.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatParticipantAddedToThreadWithUser event.

time.description: The time at which the user was added to the thread

addedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who added the user

participantAdded.description: The details of the user who was added

AcsChatParticipantRemovedFromThreadEvent.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadParticipantRemoved event.

time.description: The time at which the user was removed to the thread

removedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who removed the user

participantRemoved.description: The details of the user who was removed

AcsChatParticipantRemovedFromThreadWithU.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatParticipantRemovedFromThreadWithUser event.

time.description: The time at which the user was removed to the thread

removedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who removed the user

participantRemoved.description: The details of the user who was removed

AcsChatThreadCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadCreated event.

createdByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who created the thread

participants.description: The list of properties of participants who are part of the thread

AcsChatThreadCreatedWithUserEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadCreatedWithUser event.

createdByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who created the thread

participants.description: The list of properties of participants who are part of the thread

AcsChatThreadDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadDeleted event.

deletedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who deleted the thread

deleteTime.description: The deletion time of the thread

AcsChatThreadEventBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all chat thread events

createTime.description: The original creation time of the thread

AcsChatThreadEventInThreadBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all chat thread events

createTime.description: The original creation time of the thread

AcsChatThreadParticipantProperties.description: Schema of the chat thread participant

participantCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user

AcsChatThreadPropertiesUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadPropertiesUpdated event.

editedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who updated the thread properties

editTime.description: The time at which the properties of the thread were updated

AcsChatThreadPropertiesUpdatedPerUserEve.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadPropertiesUpdatedPerUser event.

editedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who updated the thread properties

editTime.description: The time at which the properties of the thread were updated

AcsChatThreadWithUserDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadWithUserDeleted event.

deletedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who deleted the thread

deleteTime.description: The deletion time of the thread

AcsEmailDeliveryReportReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.EmailDeliveryReportReceived event.

messageId.description: The Id of the email been sent

status.description: The status of the email. Any value other than Delivered is considered failed.

deliveryStatusDetails.description: Detailed information about the status if any

deliveryAttemptTimeStamp.description: The time at which the email delivery report received timestamp

AcsEmailDeliveryReportStatus.description: The status of the email. Any value other than Delivered is considered failed.

values.name: Bounced
values.description: Hard bounce detected while sending the email

values.name: Failed
values.description: The email failed to be delivered

values.name: FilteredSpam
values.description: The message was identified as spam and was rejected or blocked (not quarantined).

values.name: Quarantined
values.description: The message was quarantined (as spam, bulk mail, or phishing). For more information, see Quarantined email messages in EOP (EXCHANGE ONLINE PROTECTION).

AcsEmailDeliveryReportStatusDetails.description: Detailed information about the status if any

AcsEmailEngagementTrackingReportReceived.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.EmailEngagementTrackingReportReceived event.

messageId.description: The Id of the email that has been sent

userActionTimeStamp.description: The time at which the user interacted with the email

engagementContext.description: The context of the type of engagement user had with email

userAgent.description: The user agent interacting with the email

engagementType.description: The type of engagement user have with email

AcsIncomingCallEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.Communication.IncomingCall event

to.description: The communication identifier of the target user.

from.description: The communication identifier of the user who initiated the call.

serverCallId.description: The Id of the server call

values.name: buttonReply
values.description: Messaged interactive reply type is ButtonReply

values.name: listReply
values.description: Messaged interactive reply type is ListReply

values.name: unknown
values.description: Messaged interactive reply type is Unknown

payload.description: The Payload of the button which was clicked by the user, setup by the business

values.name: whatsapp
values.description: Updated message channel type is WhatsApp

from.description: The WhatsApp ID for the customer who replied to an inbound message.

id.description: The message ID for the sent message for an inbound reply

AcsMessageDeliveryStatusUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.AdvancedMessageDeliveryStatusUpdated event.

AcsMessageEventData.description: Schema of common properties of all chat thread events

AcsMessageInteractiveButtonReplyContent.description: Message Interactive button reply content for a user to business message

buttonReply.description: The Message Sent when a customer clicks a button

listReply.description: The Message Sent when a customer selects an item from a list

AcsMessageInteractiveListReplyContent.description: Message Interactive list reply content for a user to business message

id.description: The ID of the selected list item

title.description: The title of the selected list item

description.description: The description of the selected row

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the file this media represents

fileName.description: The filename of the underlying media file as specified when uploaded

caption.description: The caption for the media object, if supported and provided

AcsMessageReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.AdvancedMessageReceived event.

AcsRecordingChunkInfoProperties.description: Schema for all properties of  Recording Chunk Information.

documentId.description: The documentId of the recording chunk

index.description: The index of the recording chunk

endReason.description: The reason for ending the recording chunk

metadataLocation.description: The location of the metadata for this chunk

contentLocation.description: The location of the content for this chunk

deleteLocation.description: The location to delete all chunk storage

AcsRecordingFileStatusUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RecordingFileStatusUpdated event.

recordingStorageInfo.description: The details of recording storage information

recordingStartTime.description: The time at which the recording started

recordingContentType.description: The recording content type- AudioVideo, or Audio

recordingChannelType.description: The recording  channel type - Mixed, Unmixed

recordingFormatType.description: The recording format type - Mp4, Mp3, Wav

sessionEndReason.description: The reason for ending recording session

AcsRecordingStorageInfoProperties.description: Schema for all properties of Recording Storage Information.

recordingChunks.description: List of details of recording chunks information

capacityCostPerJob.description: Capacity Cost Per Job for Router Job

maxNumberOfJobs.description: Max Number of Jobs for Router Job

AcsRouterEventData.description: Schema of common properties of all Router events

AcsRouterJobCancelledEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobCancelled event

AcsRouterJobClassificationFailedEventDat.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobClassificationFailed event

AcsRouterJobClassifiedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobClassified event

AcsRouterJobClosedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobClosed event

AcsRouterJobCompletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobCompleted event

AcsRouterJobDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobDeleted event

AcsRouterJobEventData.description: Schema of common properties of all Router Job events

AcsRouterJobExceptionTriggeredEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobExceptionTriggered event

ruleKey.description: Router Job Exception Triggered Rule Key

exceptionRuleId.description: Router Job Exception Triggered Rule Id

AcsRouterJobQueuedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobQueued event

attachedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Queued Attached Worker Selector

requestedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Queued Requested Worker Selector

AcsRouterJobReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobReceived event

requestedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Received Requested Worker Selectors

scheduledOn.description: Router Job Received Scheduled Time in UTC

unavailableForMatching.description: Unavailable For Matching for Router Job Received

AcsRouterJobSchedulingFailedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobSchedulingFailed event

expiredAttachedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Scheduling Failed Attached Worker Selector Expired

expiredRequestedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Scheduling Failed Requested Worker Selector Expired

scheduledOn.description: Router Job Scheduling Failed Scheduled Time in UTC

values.name: WaitingForActivation
values.description: Router Job Status Waiting For Activation

AcsRouterJobUnassignedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobUnassigned event

AcsRouterJobWaitingForActivationEventDat.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobWaitingForActivation event

priority.description: Router Job Waiting For Activation Priority

expiredAttachedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Waiting For Activation Worker Selector Expired

expiredRequestedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Waiting For Activation Requested Worker Selector Expired

scheduledOn.description: Router Job Waiting For Activation Scheduled Time in UTC

unavailableForMatching.description: Router Job Waiting For Activation Unavailable For Matching

AcsRouterJobWorkerSelectorsExpiredEventD.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterJobWorkerSelectorsExpired event

expiredRequestedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Worker Selectors Expired Requested Worker Selectors

expiredAttachedWorkerSelectors.description: Router Job Worker Selectors Expired Attached Worker Selectors

AcsRouterLabelOperator.description: Router Job Worker Selector Label Operator

values.name: GreaterThanOrEqual
values.description: Router Label Operator Greater than or equal

values.name: LessThanOrEqual
values.description: Router Label Operator Less than or equal

AcsRouterUpdatedWorkerProperty.description: Worker properties that can be updated

AcsRouterWorkerDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerDeleted event

AcsRouterWorkerDeregisteredEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerDeregistered event

AcsRouterWorkerEventData.description: Schema of common properties of all Router Worker events

AcsRouterWorkerOfferAcceptedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerOfferAccepted event

queueId.description: Router Worker Offer Accepted Queue Id

offerId.description: Router Worker Offer Accepted Offer Id

assignmentId.description: Router Worker Offer Accepted Assignment Id

jobPriority.description: Router Worker Offer Accepted Job Priority

workerLabels.description: Router Worker Offer Accepted Worker Labels

workerTags.description: Router Worker Offer Accepted Worker Tags

jobLabels.description: Router Worker Offer Accepted Job Labels

jobTags.description: Router Worker Offer Accepted Job Tags

AcsRouterWorkerOfferDeclinedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerOfferDeclined event

queueId.description: Router Worker Offer Declined Queue Id

offerId.description: Router Worker Offer Declined Offer Id

AcsRouterWorkerOfferExpiredEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerOfferExpired event

queueId.description: Router Worker Offer Expired Queue Id

offerId.description: Router Worker Offer Expired Offer Id

AcsRouterWorkerOfferIssuedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerOfferIssued event

queueId.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Queue Id

offerId.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Offer Id

jobPriority.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Job Priority

workerLabels.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Worker Labels

offeredOn.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Time in UTC

expiresOn.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Expiration Time in UTC

workerTags.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Worker Tags

jobLabels.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Job Labels

jobTags.description: Router Worker Offer Issued Job Tags

AcsRouterWorkerOfferRevokedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerOfferRevoked event

queueId.description: Router Worker Offer Revoked Queue Id

offerId.description: Router Worker Offer Revoked Offer Id

AcsRouterWorkerRegisteredEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerRegistered event

labelOperator.description: Router Job Worker Selector Label Operator

ttlSeconds.description: Router Job Worker Selector Time to Live in Seconds

expirationTime.description: Router Job Worker Selector Expiration Time

AcsRouterWorkerUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RouterWorkerUpdated event.

AcsSmsDeliveryAttemptProperties.description: Schema for details of a delivery attempt

segmentsSucceeded.description: Number of segments that were successfully delivered

segmentsFailed.description: Number of segments whose delivery failed

AcsSmsDeliveryReportReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.SMSDeliveryReportReceived event.

deliveryAttempts.description: List of details of delivery attempts made

receivedTimestamp.description: The time at which the SMS delivery report was received

AcsSmsEventBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all SMS events

messageId.description: The identity of the SMS message

from.description: The identity of SMS message sender

to.description: The identity of SMS message receiver

AcsSmsReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.SMSReceived event.

receivedTimestamp.description: The time at which the SMS was received

AcsUserDisconnectedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.Communication.UserDisconnected event.

userCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who was disconnected

AcsUserEngagement.description: The type of engagement user have with email.

CommunicationIdentifierModel.description: Identifies a participant in Azure Communication services. A participant is, for example, a phone number or an Azure communication user. This model must be interpreted as a union: Apart from rawId, at most one further property may be set.

kind.description: The identifier kind. Only required in responses.

rawId.description: Raw Id of the identifier. Optional in requests, required in responses.

CommunicationUserIdentifierModel.description: A user that got created with an Azure Communication Services resource.

id.description: The Id of the communication user.

appId.description: The Id of the Microsoft Teams application

cloud.description: The cloud that the Microsoft Teams application belongs to. By default 'public' if missing.

userId.description: The Id of the Microsoft Teams user. If not anonymous, this is the AAD object Id of the user.

isAnonymous.description: True if the Microsoft Teams user is anonymous. By default false if missing.

cloud.description: The cloud that the Microsoft Teams user belongs to. By default 'public' if missing.

value.description: The phone number in E.164 format.
